Name: Galaxy Annihilation
About the game: Galaxy Annihilation is a shoot'em up where we need to protect the planet earth from an impending alien attack. - 3 difficulties (easy, normal, hard). - 31 missions. - survival mode. - 4 worlds. - 15 ships. - 12 weapons. - 13 powerups. - many permanent upgrades to unlock. - 8 bosses. - 14 achievements to unlock. And Much More... Keyboard and mouse Wasd Or Arrow Keys - to Move the Spaceships. left-click or spacebar - to shoot with the primary weapon. right-click or E - to shoot with secondary weapon. middle-mouse button or Q - to use the special. Controller Left analogue stick - to Move the spaceships. A on gamepad - to shoot with the primary weapon. B on gamepad - to shoot with secondary weapon. X on gamepad - to use the special. Right analog stick - to navigate on the menus.
